snippet: Contractors with billions of dollars at stake could be big losers, but European Union officials said a meeting next week on the project would still take place.

byline.original: By STANLEY REED and JAMES KANTER

lead_paragraph: Contractors with billions of dollars at stake could be big losers, but European Union officials said a meeting next week on the project would still take place.

headline.main: Putin’s Surprise Call to Scrap South Stream Gas Pipeline Leaves Europe Reeling
headline.print_headline: Putin’s Surprise Call to Scrap South Stream Gas Pipeline Leaves Europe Reeling
